name: Arcane Trickster
description: Rakes who have incorporated arcane magic into their repertoire, using illusions and enchantments to further their goals while maintaining a code of honor that guides their actions toward helping others and fighting injustice.

resource_systems.name: Energy
resource_systems.description: Physical energy that powers stealth abilities and precision strikes
resource_systems.regeneration: 5 per 6 seconds, +8 when in stealth or casting illusion magic
mechanics: Energy points are spent to perform special stealth maneuvers and precision attacks
Some abilities require maintaining focus, consuming energy over time
Short rests restore a significant portion of maximum energy
Depleted energy causes penalties to stealth and spell effectiveness
Can be temporarily boosted through adrenaline in critical situations
Successful combination of stealth and magic restores a portion of energy

resource_systems.name: Cunning
resource_systems.description: Mental acuity and tactical awareness that enhances deception and exploitation of weaknesses
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when successfully using stealth, magic, or outwitting opponents
mechanics: Increases by 20 when successfully combining magic with stealth or social manipulation
Increases by 25 when using illusions to overcome challenges non-violently
Decreases by 20 when detected during stealth or when magical deceptions fail
Decreases by 25 when forced to resort to direct violence
Can be spent to enhance magical abilities or execute precision strikes
Higher Cunning increases spell potency and critical hit chance

resource_systems.name: Infamy
resource_systems.description: Reputation and notoriety that can be leveraged for intimidation or respect
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when successfully completing difficult heists for good causes
mechanics: Increases by 15 when completing challenging heists that benefit the innocent
Increases by 10 when using skills to expose corruption or thwart villains
Decreases by 15 when failing publicly or being captured
Decreases by 10 when reputation is questioned or undermined
Can be spent to intimidate wrongdoers or inspire potential allies
Higher Infamy increases the effectiveness of social abilities and reputation-based skills

resource_systems.name: Arcane Power
resource_systems.description: Magical energy that fuels illusions, enchantments, and arcane tricks
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when studying magical phenomena or successfully casting spells
mechanics: Increases by 15 when studying new magical phenomena or artifacts
Increases by 10 when successfully using magic to overcome challenges
Decreases by 15 when spells are countered or dispelled
Decreases by 10 when attempting to cast in anti-magic fields
Can be spent to enhance spell effects or combine magic with stealth techniques
At maximum Arcane Power, spells cost less energy and have increased potency

class_mechanics.name: Illusory Infiltration
class_mechanics.description: Combination of stealth with illusion magic for unparalleled infiltration
effects: Can create illusory duplicates to distract or confuse observers
Able to magically mask sounds and visual traces of movement
Can create illusory terrain or objects to hide or misdirect
Presence can be magically disguised to appear as someone else or something innocuous
Can temporarily become partially incorporeal to pass through minor obstacles

class_mechanics.name: Enchanted Manipulation
class_mechanics.description: Use of enchantment magic to enhance social engineering
effects: Can magically enhance persuasiveness and credibility
Able to sense emotional states and surface thoughts of targets
Can plant subtle magical suggestions that feel natural to the target
Presence naturally puts others at ease and builds trust
Can magically discern truth from lies with high accuracy

class_mechanics.name: Arcane Precision
class_mechanics.description: Enhancement of precision strikes with magical energy
effects: Weapons can be temporarily enchanted for additional magical effects
Can target magical vulnerabilities in addition to physical ones
Able to disrupt magical effects with precisely aimed strikes
Presence can temporarily suppress minor magical effects
Can analyze and counter magical defenses with specialized techniques

class_mechanics.name: Robin Hood Code
class_mechanics.description: Moral code that guides actions toward justice and helping others
effects: Gains power bonuses when acting to protect the innocent or fight injustice
Can inspire allies with acts of heroism and generosity
Able to sense the true intentions and moral alignment of others
Presence naturally reassures the innocent and intimidates the guilty
Can establish trust quickly with those who share similar values

signature_abilities.name: Perfect Illusion
signature_abilities.description: Create a flawless illusion that can fool even magical detection
mechanics: For 10 minutes, create and maintain a complex illusion that affects all senses
Illusion can be as large as a small building or as detailed as multiple individuals
The illusion can respond intelligently to interaction and adapt to circumstances
Even magical detection methods have difficulty identifying the illusion
Can be used to create diversions, safe passages, or elaborate scenarios
Costs 100 Energy, 50 Cunning, and 75 Arcane Power

signature_abilities.name: Phantom Heist
signature_abilities.description: Temporarily phase between material and ethereal states to perform impossible thefts
mechanics: For 5 minutes, gain the ability to phase through solid objects at will
While phased, you are invisible and can pass through most physical barriers
Can selectively make parts of your body solid to manipulate objects
Magical wards and barriers still present obstacles but can be analyzed for weaknesses
Perfect for retrieving items from secure locations or rescuing prisoners
Costs 75 Energy, 30 Infamy, and 50 Arcane Power

signature_abilities.name: Arcane Trickery
signature_abilities.description: Unleash a flurry of magical tricks and illusions that confound enemies and empower allies
mechanics: For 3 minutes, gain the ability to cast minor illusions and enchantments instantly
Create up to 5 illusory duplicates that can act independently
Weapons become enchanted with magical energy, bypassing resistances
Each successful trick or deception extends the duration by 10 seconds
Perfect for controlling chaotic situations or creating opportunities
Costs 50 Energy, 100 Arcane Power, and 25 Cunning

skill_trees.name: Path of Illusion
skill_trees.focus: Mastery of illusion magic and deceptive techniques
key_abilities: Grand Illusion: Create complex, interactive illusions that fool all senses
Illusory Self: Replace yourself with an illusion when attacked, avoiding damage
Reality Blur: Make it difficult for others to distinguish between illusion and reality

skill_trees.name: Path of Enchantment
key_abilities: Suggestion: Plant powerful but subtle magical suggestions in targets' minds
Emotional Manipulation: Magically influence emotional states for tactical advantage
Memory Alteration: Subtly modify recent memories of witnesses or targets

skill_trees.name: Path of the Benefactor
skill_trees.focus: Using skills to help others and fight injustice
key_abilities: Robin's Gift: Steal valuable items and redistribute them to those in need
Expose Corruption: Uncover and reveal evidence of wrongdoing by the powerful
Rescue Operation: Specialized techniques for freeing captives and saving innocents

advancement_requirements.skill_points: At least 15 points in the Social Manipulator skill tree
advancement_requirements.alignment: Must maintain Good alignment for at least 10 levels
challenges: Use stealth and magic to overcome a challenge without violence
Successfully steal from the corrupt to benefit the needy

legendary_items.name: Wand of Infinite Illusions
effects: Intelligence increased by 5
Illusion spells cost 30% less Arcane Power
Can maintain an additional complex illusion without concentration

legendary_items.name: Cloak of the Phantom Thief
effects: Dexterity increased by 3
Can become invisible for short periods even in direct light
Phantom Heist cooldown reduced by 1 day

legendary_items.name: Lockpicks of Possibility
effects: Can open any lock, including those enhanced by magic
Can temporarily disable magical wards and alarms
Once per day, can create a temporary passage through a solid barrier

lore: Arcane Tricksters represent the pinnacle of magical deception among Rakes, having incorporated arcane magic into their repertoire of skills to become masters of illusion and enchantment. These magical infiltrators have transcended ordinary thievery to become champions of justice who use their extraordinary abilities to help the innocent, expose corruption, and fight against tyranny. The path to becoming an Arcane Trickster requires not only exceptional stealth and social skills but also a natural aptitude for magic and a strong moral compass that guides their actions toward the greater good. Those who succeed find themselves blessed with the ability to perform seemingly impossible feats, slipping past impenetrable defenses and accomplishing heists that others would consider magical—because they are. Arcane Tricksters often operate as vigilantes or secret benefactors, stealing from corrupt nobles or officials and redistributing wealth to those in need. Many work to expose injustice and corruption, using their skills to gather evidence that would otherwise remain hidden behind locked doors and magical wards. Some even serve as specialized agents for good-aligned organizations, handling delicate missions that require both moral integrity and a flexible approach to rules and boundaries. Their combination of stealth, social manipulation, and arcane magic makes them uniquely suited to overcome challenges that would stymie both conventional thieves and traditional spellcasters. Though they possess tremendous skill, Arcane Tricksters use their abilities with restraint and compassion, understanding that their talents come with a responsibility to help others and fight against injustice rather than pursuing personal gain or power.
